data.what_is:
All of your communications, competitions and contacts in one place

TractionNext provides a more relevant and engaging brand experience to customers. With real time insights and reporting across multiple digital channels all in the one place so you can easily leverage data intelligence to drive performance.

Experts in end to end execution using inbuilt features in TractionNext like Mobile Wallet, Landing Pages, Competition/Promotions and Automations.
data.product_description: TractionNext combines your enterprise email marketing, campaigns, contacts and communications into one easy-to-use platform

initial_reviews.review_title: perfect communication tool for campaign management automation.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about TractionNext?
TractionNext is a priceless tool because of which campaign management is no longer a great deal for us. Now we can have all our contacts and competition details all in one place. and also assisted us in our conversations and after it, campaign workflow has become quite smooth. we can have a view of our emails, SMS, promotions and can also conduct surveys pretty effortlessly. It has many other features like that of management of the list, library for images, template management, and subscriber management too. All these are available to us on this single platform and also at a highly amazing price.

What do you dislike about TractionNext?
I think there must be the presence of cellphone-optimized emails and unfortunately, it is missing in it. Using this facility we would have been able to manage emails using a phone which would be handier.

What problems is TractionNext solving and how is that benefiting you?
TractionNext is a name of the highly trustable tool for us with it our communication has taken a new turn and we can manage our lists, subscribers, and templates on one platform. It has many features which are commonly necessary for people like us and above all the functions work so well and smooth too.
